  3. Integration

    1. Integrate MFE with UI

Main Process

Service Account Management

Purpose

To move from People account to Service account for creation api’s, bot’s, etc. to remove the dependency from individual account. (During exit/termination Socrates AI’s Service should not be interrupted)

Previous

Initially all the bot’s, Api, Azure Secret Key , etc., were been created from individual account.

Next

From Compliance and service stand point it is appropriate to move the identified key’s, app, bots etc. from individual account to service account managed.

title: Translated content issues in AWS mobile
body:
EDT-1169

The details below are tested in iOS

The following features break the whole content (displays blank page) when included in the translated page:

  • Table

  • Video by upload

  • Video by url

  • Video by code

  • Video by browse (initially this was displaying fine)

  • URL embed

  • Iframe embed

  • Accordion? (tbc)

The following features styles break when translated:

Issues

Origin

Translated

  1. Some spacing are removed:

    1. links (in purple)

    2. italic

    3. underline

    4. strikethrough

    5. colors (text and background)

  2. Emoji is bigger

Indent is removed

autocomplete: Comparison between various Airflow orchestrator tool
title: Comparison between various Airflow orchestrator tool
body:
Introduction

We are evaluating various Airflow orchestrator tools primarily because of following challenges with self hosted Airflow.

  1. Cluster Maintenance

  2. Version upgrade

  3. Security

  4. Deployment and adding nodes in the cluster

  5. Configuration management

  6. Auto-Scaling

To solve challenges around self hosted Airflow cluster, we can use Cloud managed workflow engines and we will be evaluating from list below for our use-case.

Service

Features

MWAA

Perfect

Astronomer

Dagster

1

Easy of setup

Dagster Cloud support both Hybrid and Serverless.

Hybrid - Control managed by Dagster and data plane managed by us

Serverless - Both control and data plane managed by Dagster

2

Cost(For individual users, not enterprise plan)

Environment charge $0.01 per compute minute (PCM)

Worker charge =$0.0018 PCM per instance

Scheduler charge $0.0018 PCM per instance

Total - $0.011 PCM-PI

Meta database charge
40 GB or storage x $0.10 GB-month = $4.00

Less initial cost, flexible pricing,

Pricing model not public. Need to contact their sales team.

Simple pricing

Hybrid - $0.03 PCM
Serverless - $0.04 per compute minute

3

Virtual environment per DAG

Complicated

Easily manageable

Not needed

4

Customisation of Docker images

5

Easy of config updates

6

Scaling

7

Airflow update and General Availability

Slow updates

Mostly latest

Top Open source contributor to Airflow ecosystem, always uses latest version

8

Data transfer between tasks

Problematic

Default feature share running metadata between task

9

Monitoring and integration

Slack

10

SSO

Not needed as we have AWS accounts for existing infrastructure usages

Google

11

Testing

Complicated, even with local airflow setup, mocking AWS services will be a challenge.

Fully mocked pyspark + dagster pipelines that can run locally and in CI.

12

13

14

15

title: Redis for AI/ML Services
body:
Overview

Redis has been identified as in-memory datastore to provision caching requirements of AI/ML services.

Infra Requirements

AWS ElasticCache is being used as cloud service provider for Redis.

Storage assessment for various AI/ML services

Content Recommendation

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1kXNqwegGbsArtV_l2_bcoeNyOfpkCWauGDL5g99GNB8/edit#gid=0

Related Content

Naming Convention

All the AI/ML related namespaces will be pre-fixed with idx_ds_<service_name>_<name>.

The namespaces common across multiple AI/ML services will have name pre-fixed as idx_ds_common_<name>.
